## 🛠 How to Test
1. **Run migration (if applicable):**  
   ```sh
   yarn migrate
   ```
2. **Test the new feature or bug fix:**  
   ```sh
   yarn ts-node scripts/your-script.ts
   ```
3. **Run additional checks:**  
   ```sh
   yarn test
   ```
4. **Verify database or API responses if needed.**
